00022 #ifndef _Singleton_H_
00023 #define _Singleton_H_
00024 
00030 #include "SystemPrereqs.h"
00031 
00032 namespace System
00033 {
00034 
00041 template < class T >
00042 class SingletonStatic 
00043 {  
00044 public:
00045 
00046   virtual ~SingletonStatic() { }
00047 
00052   inline static T &getSingleton() { return m_singleton; }
00053 
00058   inline static T *getSingletonPtr() { return &m_singleton; }
00059 
00060 private: 
00061   static T m_singleton; 
00062 };
00063 
00064 // Singleton definition
00065 template < class T >
00066 T SingletonStatic<T>::m_singleton;
00067 
00068 
00069 template < class T >
00076 class Singleton
00077 {
00078 public:
00079 
00080     virtual ~Singleton() { }
00081 
00087   inline static T &getSingleton() { 
00088     if ( !m_singleton ){
00089       m_singleton = new T();
00090     }
00091     return *m_singleton; 
00092   }
00093 
00099   inline static T *getSingletonPtr() { 
00100     if ( !m_singleton ){
00101       m_singleton = new T();
00102     }
00103     return m_singleton; 
00104   }
00105   
00107   void static destroySingleton() { if(m_singleton) {delete m_singleton; m_singleton = 0; } }
00108 
00109 private:
00110   static T *m_singleton; 
00111 };
00112 
00113 //Singleton 
00114 template < class T >
00115 T *Singleton<T>::m_singleton = 0;
00116 
00117 } // namespace System
00118 
00119 #endif // _Singleton_H_
